meta.article_title: October 14, 2019 - React to Opponent's Forward Swing

react_to_opponents_forward_swing.probleme: Reacting too late to opponent's forward swing

debutant: Constantly watch opponents and try to react to where they are going from their forward swing

exercices_complementaires.nom: Practice reacting to opponent's forward swing
exercices_complementaires.description: Watch opponents and try to react before they hit the ball; learn to commit to a direction

metriques_progression: Learn to figure out when opponent is committed to a direction and react reflexively
erreurs_a_eviter: Don't wait until the opponent hits the ball before reacting; learn to read opponents' forward swing
